form.label: MITRE ATT&CK Threat Actor Rule Finder
form.description: Please enter the technique name in order to find the related correlation rules defined within Enterprise Security.

search.query: | makeresults | eval mitre_use_es=`mitre_use_es` | eval results=if(mitre_use_es=="1",1,null()) | table results

| inputlookup mitre_all_rule_technique_lookup | `lookup_technique_threat_actor_from_rule_name` | search technique_id=$mitre_technique_id$ | eval app_name=mvdedup(app_name), rule_disabled=mvdedup(rule_disabled) | eval Status = if(rule_disabled=0,"Enabled","Disabled") | eval show_cond = if(("$display_rule_status$"=="all_rules") OR ("$display_rule_status$"!="all_rules" AND Status = "Enabled"), 1 , 0) | where show_cond = 1 | rename rule_name as "Rule Name", app_name as "Application", actor_id as "Actor ID", actor_name as "Actor", technique_id as "Technique ID", technique_name as "Technique" | fields "Rule Name", "Application", Status, "Actor ID", "Actor", "Technique ID", "Technique"
